snippet: Texas backed down from efforts to block six Syrian refugees from resettling in Dallas after the Obama administration reiterated in federal court that the state lacked authority.
abstract: Texas reverses course on blocking entry to six Syrian refugees following Obama administration's statement in federal court that state lacks authority to do so.
lead_paragraph: Texas backed down from efforts to block six Syrian refugees from resettling in Dallas after the Obama administration reiterated in federal court that the state lacked authority.

headline.main: Texas: Path Is Cleared for Refugees
headline.print_headline: Texas: Path Is Cleared for Refugees
